Mike Pence , a story Friday highlighted the effort by a group of conservatives, including former House Republican Majority Leader Dick Armey and former Dick Armey Jim Ryun , to convince him to run for president rather than Indiana governor. For them, the Hoosier checks many boxes- a fresh face on the national scene, a charismatic speaker from the heartland and, most important, a Republican who can appeal to all three elements of the party base: social conservatives, economic conservatives and foreign policy conservatives, the story said. Daniels and Mike Pence both received votes when the New Hampshire Republican Party held a straw poll during a meeting Saturday. A total of 273 ballots were cast, according to news accounts of

moral, social and cultural development. Changes- expected to be introduced next year- will also see outstanding schools spared inspections altogether unless parents or Government officials raise concerns. Mr Michael Gove said: There are areas of Ofsted inspections, such as community cohesion or regulations governing what students bring in in their lunchboxes at lunchtime, which are entirely peripheral. "One of the problems with Ofsted inspections is that they are asked to inspect and measure for things which, by definition, are hard to judge and not central to what schools are about. The Bill will also lead to the formal abolition of a series of education quangos such as the Qualifications and Curriculum Development Agency, the General Teaching Council for England and the Training and Development Agency for Schools
